Text: Oh PS. I block uploads to most people, until I get a few people who have most of it. That way it gets out sooner, as I can upload to 2-3 people at a time a lot quicker then I can to 10 at a time, and its more important to get the full upload out quickly to a few people who can send it to many imo. peace and enjoy.

I\'m going offline in a few. I\'ll be periodically return to seed though, so no need to give up. This torrent is going to need others to help seed it, and not just disconnect when you have it. I only have a upload of 100Kb/s

Just so everyone knows, it appear everyone getting this is bailing on seeding it for others, but I will periodically return to seeding my torrents for at least a week or so. beyond that it'll be hit or miss, and the community will have to help each other...as it should.
